author: dkhaywood
msg: no-architecture: renamed MaxLengthFacetZero -> MaxLengthFacetUnlimited; added ObjectValidPropertiesFacet (checks all props are valid prior to allowing an object to be persisted).

author: dkhaywood
msg: testlib: changes to exceptions, Documentor; added (hamcrest) ClassEqualsMatcher; added DelegatingDocumentor.

author: dkhaywood
msg: applib: Added new @Ignore annotation to ignore properties, actions or collections.  Added #flush() and #commit() to DomainObjectContainer: needed for XATs that sense a change (eg a disposeInstance) by running a repository query against the objectstore.
